Plot: When a foreign exchange student arrives in a small upstate New York town, she challenges the dynamics of her host family's relationships and alters their lives forever.
Title: Breathe In
Actors: Guy Pearce, Felicity Jones, Amy Ryan, Mackenzie Davis
tomatoConsensus: Breathe In's plot never quite sparks the way it should, but it remains thoroughly watchable thanks to strong performances from Felicity Jones and Guy Pearce.
